mentors.name: Sarah Chen
mentors.bio: 10+ years in product management with expertise in user experience and data-driven decision making. Passionate about helping early-career professionals navigate the tech industry.

mentors.name: Marcus Rodriguez
mentors.bio: Former startup founder turned engineering leader. Specializes in scaling engineering teams and mentoring developers transitioning into leadership roles.

mentors.name: Aisha Patel
mentors.bio: Creative design leader with a background in psychology. Helps designers build their portfolios and transition into senior roles in the design industry.

mentors.name: David Kim
mentors.bio: PhD in Statistics with experience in recommendation systems and machine learning. Mentors data scientists and analysts looking to advance their careers.

mentors.name: Emily Thompson
mentors.bio: Growth marketing expert with experience in B2B SaaS. Helps marketing professionals develop their skills and advance in their careers.

mentors.name: Krish Goel
mentors.bio: Visionary entrepreneur and founder of Leap, revolutionizing career development through AI-powered tools and personalized mentorship. Passionate about empowering the next generation of professionals to leap into their dream careers.
